tree.name: Gabe Vincent
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks trade Luke Kennard to Lakers for Gabe Vincent and a 2032 2nd-round pick
tree.note: 2023 NBA Finals starter with Miami, playoff-tested guard

assetsGivenUp.name: Luke Kennard
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Hawks signed Kennard as free agent from Memphis, 1-year $11M deal
assetsGivenUp.note: Elite 3-point shooter, career 44% from deep. Sent to LAL in Vincent trade.

tradeChain.name: Gabe Vincent
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Lakers signed Vincent as free agent from Heat, 3-year $33M deal
tradeChain.note: Signed after 2023 Finals run with Miami

tradeChain.name: Gabe Vincent
tradeChain.note: ORIGIN - Undrafted 2018, UC Santa Barbara. Developed in G-League with Stockton Kings.
